full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Real Property Framework Services

## Solicitation Number
3Y004-240015

## Publication Date
September 29, 2023

## Tender Closing Date
October 17, 2023 2:00 PM EDT

## Description

Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR) requires the services of a Financial/Cost Specialist for Real Property to lifecycle manage its assets and comply with all requirements associated with the management of federal government real property. Specifically, POLAR seeks expertise in determining baseline reference levels for operating, maintaining, and recapitalizing real property assets at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS). This includes developing justifications for recapitalization, price, and volume protection associated with annual operations and maintenance costs.

## Services

The successful contractor will provide senior resource support under Stream 4.5 for a period of six months, including:

* Determining baseline reference levels for operating, maintaining, and recapitalizing real property assets at CHARS
* Developing justifications for recapitalization, price, and volume protection associated with annual operations and maintenance costs
* Providing expertise and guidance on financial management and cost analysis

## Selection Criteria

The selection of the successful contractor will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
